entry.title: A Machine Learning Textbook
entry.content:
Machine Learning: A Probabilistic Perspective

I will use this book to learn ML because it is similar to Bishop’s Pattern recognition and machine learning. But it’s algorithms are implemented in Matlab/Octave and it also contains the new contents such as deep learning.

Book’s link

The supplementary

When I use this book to learn ML, I will use the following materials too.

  • Matlab/Octave source code pmtk3

  • A learning course which uses this book as a textbook. ML’s course
